Package uno.anahata.asi.model.core

Class BlobPart

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.model.core.AbstractPart
uno.anahata.asi.model.core.BlobPart
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
ModelBlobPart
public class BlobPart extends AbstractPart
Represents a binary data part, such as an image or a document. It can be created from raw bytes or directly from a file path, in which case it retains a reference to the source path for traceability.
Author:
anahata-gemini-pro-2.5

  • Constructor Details

    • BlobPart

      public BlobPart(@NonNull @NonNull AbstractMessage message, @NonNull @NonNull String mimeType, @NonNull @lombok.NonNull byte[] data)
      Constructs a BlobPart from raw byte data and a specified MIME type. The source path will be null.
      Parameters:
      mimeType - The MIME type.
      data - The binary data.

  • Method Details

    • from

      public static BlobPart from(@NonNull @NonNull AbstractMessage message, @NonNull @NonNull Path path) throws Exception
      A convenience factory method to create a BlobPart from a local file path. It automatically reads the file's bytes, detects its MIME type using Tika, and stores a reference to the source path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the file.
      Returns:
      A new BlobPart instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there's an error reading the file.
      Exception - if there's an error detecting the MIME type.

    • from

      public static BlobPart from(@NonNull @NonNull AbstractMessage message, @NonNull @NonNull File file) throws Exception
      A convenience factory method to create a BlobPart from a legacy File object.
      Throws:
      Exception
      See Also:
      • #from(Path)

    • asText

      public String asText()
      Description copied from class: AbstractPart
      Returns the content of the part as a simple string. This is implemented by subclasses.

    • getDefaultTurnsToKeep

      protected int getDefaultTurnsToKeep()
      Description copied from class: AbstractPart
      Template method hook for subclasses to provide their specific default retention policy. This is the fallback value used when no explicit turnsToKeep is set on the instance.
      Specified by:
      getDefaultTurnsToKeep in class AbstractPart
      Returns:
      The default number of turns for this part type.
